com.groundcontrol.game.controller.elements

Class ElementController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.groundcontrol.game.controller.elements.ElementController
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BigPlanetController, CometController, MediumBigPlanetController, MediumPlanetController, PlayerController, SmallPlanetController

    public abstract class ElementController
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract element controller. Represents all the elements in our controller
